meanings.definition: A shot in basketball made by jumping into the air and releasing the ball at the highest point of the jump.
meanings.sent1: During the game, his jumpshots were accurate and helped his team score points.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her jumpshots every day to improve her basketball skills.
meanings.sent3: The player's jumpshots were so good, they seemed to defy gravity!
meanings.sent4: Her jumpshots were like arrows flying towards the basket, always hitting the mark.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball swishing through the net after her jumpshots was music to her ears.

meanings.definition: The act of taking a jump shot in basketball.
meanings.sent1: His coach praised his jumpshots during the game for their accuracy.
meanings.sent2: Players need to practice their jumpshots to become better at shooting in basketball.
meanings.sent3: The team's jumpshots were so synchronized, it looked like a dance on the court.
meanings.sent4: Their jumpshots were like fireworks lighting up the scoreboard with each successful shot.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered every time a jumpshot swished through the net, celebrating the skillful play.
